text: (napiye! Avarkalai nokki ‘‘vetanaiyaik kontu) nan unkalukku accamutti eccarikkai ceyvatellam vahyin mulam enakku arivikkappattavarraiye! (Nan cuyamaka etaiyum kuravillai)'' enru kuruviraka. (Eninum, ivarkal cevitarkalaip pol irukkinranar. Akave) inta cevitarkal accamutti eccarikkai ceyyappattal atai avarkal ceviyerka mattarkal
